subject: Re: Update to forms required
preview: Hi Remona, The username bookings is an existing user so I changed the User Role from "Editor" to "Administrator" so they can have access to backend with no limitations.

full_threads.body:
Hi Remona,

The username bookings is an existing user so I changed the User Role from "Editor" to "Administrator" so they can have access to backend with no limitations.

Hi Rica

Thank you. The email is bookings@hdspeechtherapy.com.au (username: bookings)

Kind Regards,​

Remona Mekdessi Sarkis

Senior Supervising Speech Pathologist, Team Leader & Business Development Assistant (CPSP) - Hills District Speech Therapy



Website: http://www.hdspeechtherapy.com.au/

Email: remona@hdspeechtherapy.com.au

Phone: (02) 9054 1996

Contact Days & Times: Mon, Tues & Wed (9.00am - 3.00pm)

Social Media: @hdspeechtherapy

CANCELLATION POLICY: All appointments at HDST are made in advance and therefore reserved to meet your specific requirements and preferences. Cancellation fees do apply. Please see our cancellation policy for more information:https://hdspeechtherapy.com.au/faqs/cancellation-policy/

Hi Remona,

Sure, we can add HDST as an Administrator to easily access the website in the backend and make changes.

Could you please provide me with the email address that we will use for this?

Thanks Rica.

Small changes such as these- is there any chance HDST can be provided with access to the forms to make these tweaks without contacting WP perk? Thank you.

Kind Regards,​

Remona Mekdessi Sarkis

Hope you had a great weekend!

Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review.

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

Sorry to ask but could you correct the text in this form to say one form for each 'adult' rather than 'child'? Thank you

Form: https://hdspeechtherapy.com.au/new-adult-client-booking/

Kind Regards,​

full_threads.body:
Hi @rica, just to clarify... what they mean is to add this text "To better assist us with processing your enquiries, please ensure that you complete a separate form for each child requiring our services"

to all forms above like this? let me know

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Manuel Lito Manceli

full_threads.body:
Hi

We are needing a reminder put on all our website enquiry forms stating:

' To better assist us with processing your enquiries, please ensure that you complete a separate form for each child requiring our services'.

Thank you.

Kind Regards,​

Remona Mekdessi Sarkis
